SELECT
FROM emp_basic_info ebi left join emp_post_info epi on ebi.pid = epi.id left join basic_position bp on epi.bpid = bp.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ebi.NAME = su.NAME left join `groups` gp on ebi.`group` = gp.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ebi.name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ebi.create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM emp_basic_info ebi left join emp_post_info epi on ebi.pid = epi.id left join basic_position bp on epi.bpid = bp.id left join workmodes wm on ebi.wid = wm.id left join `groups` gp on ebi.`group` = gp.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ebi.create_time = #{monthTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and bp.post_type= '0' or bp.post_type= '1';
